effect.shortEffect: Absorbs water moves, healing for 1/4 max HP.
effect.full: Whenever a water-type move hits this Pokémon, it heals for 1/4 of its maximum HP, negating any other effect on it. Water moves will ignore this Pokémon's substitute.

description.diamond-pearl: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.
description.platinum: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.
description.heartgold-soulsilver: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.
description.black-white: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.
description.black-2-white-2: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.
description.x-y: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.
description.sun-moon: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move, instead of taking damage.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move, instead of taking damage.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move instead of taking damage.
description.sword-shield: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move instead of taking damage.
